titles.title: A resolution honoring the life and legacy of William Robert "Bobby" "Slick" Leonard.
A resolution honoring the life and legacy of William Robert "Bobby" "Slick" Leonard.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary:
This resolution honors the life and legacy of William Robert "Bobby" "Slick" Leonard and his dedication to basketball.
The resolution recognizes (1) the historical, economical, and cultural significance and impact that Leonard had on the city of Indianapolis and the state of Indiana; and (2) the dedication and contributions to sports and entertainment of Leonard and his wife.
